actions.name: Soul Link
actions.description: Effect:Damage inflicted on the user by Physical or Special-Category attacks deals half of the inflicted damage on the attacking creature. Conversely, the user takes half of the damage it inflicts with those attacks.

system.description: Effect:Damage inflicted on the user by Physical or Special-Category attacks deals half of the inflicted damage on the attacking creature. Conversely, the user takes half of the damage it inflicts with those attacks.
